nodes.text: Jon Stewart (born November 28, 1962) is an American comedian, writer, producer, director, political commentator, actor, and television host. He is best known for hosting the late-night talk and news satire show The Daily Show from 1999 to 2015.

During Celebration V, Stewart talked with Star Wars creator George Lucas and during their conversation, Lucas announced Stewjon (a tuckerization of Stewart's name) to be Obi-Wan Kenobi's homeworld. Stewjon has since been canonized as Kenobi's official homeworld.
